text: Wilbert McClure (October 29, 1938 â€“ August 6, 2020) was an American boxer. He was an amateur. He won gold medals in the light middleweight division at the 1959 Pan American Games and the 1960 Olympics. As a professional he competed from 1961 to 1970. McClure was born in Toledo, Ohio. He died on August 6, 2020 at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:American boxers Category:Sportspeople from Toledo, Ohio
title: Wilbert McClure
